EmailTemplate.name: New Partner Onboarding.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: You're invited to our partner webinar!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We are excited to announce that the new partner portal has arrived! Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Thank you for registering to be a Bigcommerce partner! To ensure you’re taking advantages of all the benefits of your partnership, we want to invite you to a 30-minute webinar <[[http://grow.bigcommerce.com/Portal-Webinar-Register.html]]> on making the most of your Bigcommerce partner portal. In this webinar, we’ll cover:
- What’s in the Bigcommerce partner portal - How to log your deals in the our system - How to sell more through our partner program
To make it convenient, you can select from several days and times.
Attend a webinar <[[http://grow.bigcommerce.com/Portal-Webinar-Register.html]]>
Enjoy your new Partner Portal! The Bigcommerce Partner Team partnersupport@bigcommerce.com <[[mailto:partnersupport@bigcommerce.com]]>
